item.description:
BOWLING BONANZA!!!

Bring along friends, family and fun people!

Please join us for a fun night of Bowling at Kings Bowling Alley on Friday, April 10th from 7PM to 10PM!

KINGS
50 Dalton Street
Boston, MA 02115
617-266-2695 (Bowl)

Raffle Prizes include restaurant gift certificates, ice cream cakes, salon gift packages and much more! Raffle drawings will take place at 9PM...The best bowlers get the most pizza OR an extra raffle prize!

Cost:
$15 in advance - includes admission and 1 raffle ticket
$20 a the door - includes admission and 1 raffle ticket
$5 - One extra raffle ticket
$10-Three extra raffle tickets

Find us by the Green Balloons at the bowling lanes...

You can donate in advance by logging onto http://www.firstgivin... and in the comment section make sure to write Kings fundraising event
or call Maureen at Disability Law Center at 617-723-8455 x123 to pay by credit card over the phone or mail a check to Team DLC, 11 Beacon Street, Suite 925, Boston, MA
OR just meet us friendly folks when you get there....All proceeds go to Team DLC

$6.50 per person for bowling lane
$4.00 for shoe rental

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: BOWLING BONANZA!!!
